definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
(coll.) to run off at the mouth/to jabber on

sentences.english: Bo-bo was a good student who knows everything.
sentences.chinese: 后来我才知道，啵啵是三好学生呢。

sentences.english: Bo-bo was a good student who knows everything.
sentences.chinese: 后来我才知道，啵啵是三好学生呢。

sentences.english: Have you ever seen two men kiss on the top of Erebus before?
sentences.chinese: 你以前有没有见过两个男人在幽冥山顶打啵？

sentences.english: Gee, Boingo, I'm really sorry. Are you still running the cable car?
sentences.chinese: 呀，啵嘤，我真的很难过你还在开缆车吗。

sentences.english: He bubbles air into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他啵啵作响地吹空气入水里。

sentences.english: He bubbles air into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他啵啵作响地吹空气入水里。

sentences.english: He was quite hoarse, and could not pronounce Bow wow properly.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音真沙哑，连“啵”和“喔”都发不清楚。

sentences.english: There were sounds of splashings down the river.
sentences.chinese: 河的那边传来河水啵啦的声音。

definition: denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
child's buttocks (esp. Cantonese)/(onom.) crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
